definitions.text: a salt deposit that animals regularly lick

examples: the dog's laps were warm and wet
I gave him a clout on his nose

definitions.text: beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight
examples: We licked the other team on Sunday!

definitions.text: find the solution to (a problem or question) or understand the meaning of
examples: Work out your problems with the boss
this unpleasant situation isn't going to work itself out
He could not work the math problem
The cat lapped up the milk
the cub licked the milk from its mother's breast
